name: Microsoft Research PhD Fellowship
eligibility: Open to PhD students conducting research in computer science and related fields.
desc: This fellowship supports PhD students with exceptional research potential in computer science.

name: Affiliated Fellowships Doctoral Program
eligibility: Available for doctoral students demonstrating strong research ability and achievements.
desc: A prestigious fellowship program for doctoral students across all disciplines.

name: DST INSPIRE Fellowship
provider: Department of Science and Technology, India
eligibility: Open to research scholars in science and technology pursuing full-time PhD programs.
desc: Supports young researchers in science and technology with funding for their doctoral studies.

name: Fulbright-Nehru Doctoral Research Fellowships
eligibility: PhD candidates from India conducting research at U.S. institutions.
desc: Provides funding for Indian PhD scholars to conduct research in the United States.

name: Prime Minister Fellowship for Doctoral Research
eligibility: PhD candidates in Science or Technology streams with excellent academic records.
desc: Aimed at promoting innovation and research in science and technology, this fellowship offers significant financial support to doctoral candidates.

name: ICSSR Doctoral Fellowship
provider: Indian Council of Social Science Research (ICSSR)
eligibility: PhD scholars in social sciences with a first-class master's degree from a recognized university.
desc: This fellowship supports doctoral research in social sciences by providing financial aid and contingency grants for academic resources.

name: Ramanujan Fellowship
eligibility: Brilliant Indian scientists or engineers returning from abroad to take up research positions in India.
desc: Designed for exceptional researchers returning to India, this fellowship supports innovative projects across various scientific disciplines.
